long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revaluate Pro helps real estate agents, brokers, and brands know who in their database is most likely to move in the next 3-6 months.  When an old contact, lead, or acquaintance is showing signs of moving, you get an alert via email and text to know you should go grab coffee with them.
